Package org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence.caching

Class InMemoryInternalSessionCacheStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence.caching.InMemoryInternalSessionCacheStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalSessionStoreStep
    @Singleton
public class InMemoryInternalSessionCacheStep
extends Object
implements InternalSessionStoreStep
    Session cache implemented using a simple in-memory cache data structure.

        Description copied from interface: InternalSessionStoreStep
        Stores the InternalSession in the cache. This will also store any associated references which have been stored on the Session:
        • Session ID
        • Session Handle
        • Restricted Tokens
